title: Vaskiy
author: Vaskiy
created_time: March 03, 2023, 04:41:58 AMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 06:22:16 AM by Vaskiy
content: Match ScheduleParticipating TeamsMOST EXPENSIVE PLAYERSSource: ESPNcricinfo

comments.author: eaLiTy
comments.created_time: March 04, 2023, 04:20:02 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 05:26:23 PM by eaLiTy
comments.body: WIPL got to a flying start with Mumbai Indians scoring 207 runs and Gujarat Giants Women have a daunting task at hand and the chase depends upon how Beth Mooney and Ashleigh Gardner score their runs as they are their best players. Commentary team is good, stadiums are not that full like the IPL but has a lively crowd and hopefully it will be a great success.Edit: Beth Mooney is struggling with cramps which is not good for GGW and she is walking off the ground.Edit: Disappointing one sided match

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Much expected WPL have begun and some records were made. Harmanpreet Kaur have made the first half century of the WPL. Kanwar have took the first wicket of WPL. The start of the match is really enjoyable as the score went high above 200 runs. Though it hadn't gained the crowd as the IPL there is good support overall and with more seasons we can expect better progress in terms of crowd as well as in terms of players performance.Gujarat Giants failed to give the tough fight and lost every wickets for just 64 runs. Saika Ishaque bowled well taking 4 wickets. Expected something around 160 runs from Mumbai Indians had good start from Hayley Mathews followed by Harmanpreet and Kerr scoring good runs made Mumbai Indians reach such a good target.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Even with women's cricket 200+ runs made as a simple reach. In the match between Gujarat Giants and Royal Challengers the scores were very close. Gujarat Giants have scored 201/7 with the best performance coming from Dunkley 65 runs and Deol 67 runs. Royal Challengers started good to reach the target and missed by just 11 runs. Though it is loss, the performance is classy with Devine scoring the top runs and runs have come from every bat which is the best of them.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Great job! @Vaskiy. A seperate thread for WPL was needed. I am not sure why no one was aware of this thread. I would recommend you to send DM to all those members whom you see active on the other T20 thread to come here and discuss about WPL matches. Already WPL has started with a bang and many members are actively discussing about it. I would do that from now onwards.

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: Delhi Capitals Women vs Mumbai Indians Women, 7th MatchToday in Womens Premier League two strong teams will face each other. Some cricketers are supporting Mumbai Indians Women and some are supporting Delhi Capitals Women. Neither of these two teams can afford to ignore anyone. There will be wins and losses though. However, both teams are good at batting and bowling. Even though the points are the same in the points table, Mumbai Indians Women are slightly ahead in NRR.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Quote from: BobK71 on March 09, 2023, 08:51:05 AMDelhi Capitals Women vs Mumbai Indians Women, 7th MatchToday in Womens Premier League two strong teams will face each other. Some cricketers are supporting Mumbai Indians Women and some are supporting Delhi Capitals Women. Neither of these two teams can afford to ignore anyone. There will be wins and losses though. However, both teams are good at batting and bowling. Even though the points are the same in the points table, Mumbai Indians Women are slightly ahead in NRR.Both were the teams that stand undefeated. Mumbai Indians team tops the table based on the net runrate. This match is going to be one of the best matches as the winner will be the topper on the table. Both the teams haven't won toss in all the matches played. With Delhi Capitals, in both the matches opponents won the toss and decided to bowl. Delhi Capitals scored 200+ runs and won both the matches.Mumbai Indians team too lost the toss and in one match it bat first and scored 207 runs and won by a big margin. In the second match won chasing the target of 155 runs in 14.2 overs. This way both are at their best and today's toss have got importance.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: There is big hype for the match and everything got crashed with the performance of Delhi Capitals. The team had good start and the wickets started to fall. Lanning and Rodrigues have done what is being assigned for them. Rest of them are just numbers to the team. What a worst performance, At 84 Delhi Capitals have lost four wickets. Rodrigues fell at 84, then Lanning, Janessan and Minnu Mani. The team predicted to score big runs finds hard to reach 100. Once again Mumbai Indians confirm its win earlier.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on March 09, 2023, 03:18:54 AMGreat job! @Vaskiy. A seperate thread for WPL was needed. I am not sure why no one was aware of this thread. I would recommend you to send DM to all those members whom you see active on the other T20 thread to come here and discuss about WPL matches. Already WPL has started with a bang and many members are actively discussing about it. I would do that from now onwards. Very few are discussing about the Women's league. Even in the T20 discussion thread there is not much of discussion happening relative to the WPL. Most of the active members into cricket discussion could've seen the thread and they're not interested. Sending them DM about the thread isn't gonna make the thread have better discussion. Maybe in the next season's we'll have more discussion as more women's league of different countries will come into discussion.

comments.author: Sithara007
comments.body: Quote from: Vaskiy on March 10, 2023, 02:05:59 AMVery few are discussing about the Women's league. Even in the T20 discussion thread there is not much of discussion happening relative to the WPL. Most of the active members into cricket discussion could've seen the thread and they're not interested. Sending them DM about the thread isn't gonna make the thread have better discussion. Maybe in the next season's we'll have more discussion as more women's league of different countries will come into discussion.I am not sure whether a separate thread for WPL is necessary at this point. But that said, a thread on women's cricket was pending for sometime and thanks to Vaskiy for taking the initiative. Women's cricket has become very popular within the last 2-3 years in most of the full member nations. It has come a long way, and until very recently women's cricket used to be confined to England and Australia. And all this was achieved without much help from the ICC, or from the national boards such as the BCCI, PCB, ECB and CA.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: MI is rocking the first season of WPL! They have been undefeated till now and I think they have a very good chance to be the winner of the first WPL. On the other hand, we have RCB who looked pretty good team on paper but have not yet won a match. Like the men's team, they are struggling pretty hard. Smriti Mandana has not been effective as a captain or as an opener for RCB. I somehow feel the name RCB is jinxed! Whatever they do they always lose.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on March 10, 2023, 02:42:06 AMMI is rocking the first season of WPL! They have been undefeated till now and I think they have a very good chance to be the winner of the first WPL. On the other hand, we have RCB who looked pretty good team on paper but have not yet won a match. Like the men's team, they are struggling pretty hard. Smriti Mandana has not been effective as a captain or as an opener for RCB. I somehow feel the name RCB is jinxed! Whatever they do they always lose.Yes Smriti Mandhana has shown many unsatisfied innings for her fans. Whether it’s WPL or world cup, when the team needed her the most, she has failed the hopes. I was really disappointed by her innings in the Semi Final match during the World Cup, now also she isn’t doing anything better. Hope we see the OG Smriti back very soon. On the other hand, you need to praise Harmanpreet for her wonderful captaincy. She knows the task well and doing it with proper dedication and skill. As far the matches are seen, I am guessing Mumbai will take the trophy for sure. Let’s see what happens next.

comments.author: Sithara007
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on March 10, 2023, 03:02:35 AMYes Smriti Mandhana has shown many unsatisfied innings for her fans. Whether it’s WPL or world cup, when the team needed her the most, she has failed the hopes. I was really disappointed by her innings in the Semi Final match during the World Cup, now also she isn’t doing anything better. Hope we see the OG Smriti back very soon. On the other hand, you need to praise Harmanpreet for her wonderful captaincy. She knows the task well and doing it with proper dedication and skill. As far the matches are seen, I am guessing Mumbai will take the trophy for sure. Let’s see what happens next.Actually Smriti has performed decently till now. She has scored 76 runs from 3 matches so far. Everytime she got in to good starts, but couldn't convert those starts to half-centuries. And to be fair to her, she hasn't received much support from her team-mates. A lot was expected from Ellyse Perry, but she also couldn't contribute much to Royal Challengers Bangalore so far. And the capped RCB players, including Richa Ghosh and Renuka Singh seems to be out of form. RCB are at the bottom of the points table, with zero points from 3 matches. Hopefully they will perform better in the upcoming matches.

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: Quote from: Vaskiy on March 10, 2023, 02:05:59 AMQuote from: pakhitheboss on March 09, 2023, 03:18:54 AMGreat job! @Vaskiy. A seperate thread for WPL was needed. Most of the active members into cricket discussion could've seen the thread and they're not interested. Sending them DM about the thread isn't gonna make the thread have better discussion. Maybe in the next season's we'll have more discussion as more women's league of different countries will come into discussion.This is a good place to discuss the Womens Premier League. A separate thread for discussing a particular league is a very good imitative. Normally in T20 threads where various t20 sports will be discussed. I think sooner or later everyone will join here. Many may have missed it as the Womens Premier League is not so popular yet but I hope everyone will join here soon. In the next session it will definitely become familiar to everyone. But I think time is not over as there are still many matches left. Sooner or later everyone will come.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: RCB Women vs UP Warriorz to play today's match. RCB haven't started its point, hope this time they win against UP Warriorz. Experts have predicted the first'batting team to win the match and this makes winning the toss very important. Based on the matches played in the Brabourne Stadium, Mumbai it is a batting pitch. Bowlers find it hard to stop scoring. Team to bowl well is predicted to win, RCB Women's team is much expecting the performance of Heather Knight.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: Quote from: Vaskiy on March 10, 2023, 06:37:52 AMRCB Women vs UP Warriorz to play today's match. RCB haven't started its point, hope this time they win against UP Warriorz. Experts have predicted the first'batting team to win the match and this makes winning the toss very important. Based on the matches played in the Brabourne Stadium, Mumbai it is a batting pitch. Bowlers find it hard to stop scoring. Team to bowl well is predicted to win, RCB Women's team is much expecting the performance of Heather Knight. RCB won't start its point with this match. Atleast 160 runs is required batting first, RCB have managed to score 138 runs with the major contribution coming from Perry 52 runs and Devine 36 runs. Warriorz at the comfortable position scoring 97/0 in 9 overs. Healy have made her half century. With this Warriorz will record it's second win in three matches and stay on the third position in the points table.

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: Gujarat Giants vs Delhi Capitals Women, 9th MatchGujarat Giants did not have a good start in this tournament. They were overwhelmed in the first match and today in the 9th match Gujarat Giants also lost the same way against Delhi Capitals. Gujarat Giants set a target of just 105 runs to Delhi Capitals and Delhi Capitals finished the game with just 7 over 1 ball without losing any wicket. Royal Challengers Bangalore and Gujarat Giants are both weak teams in this tournament although Gujarat Giants is holding the fourth position by wining one match while Royal Challengers Bangalore didn't get any win.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Quote from: BobK71 on March 11, 2023, 05:18:29 PMGujarat Giants vs Delhi Capitals Women, 9th MatchGujarat Giants did not have a good start in this tournament. They were overwhelmed in the first match and today in the 9th match Gujarat Giants also lost the same way against Delhi Capitals. Gujarat Giants set a target of just 105 runs to Delhi Capitals and Delhi Capitals finished the game with just 7 over 1 ball without losing any wicket. Royal Challengers Bangalore and Gujarat Giants are both weak teams in this tournament although Gujarat Giants is holding the fourth position by wining one match while Royal Challengers Bangalore didn't get any win.Gujarat in its first match played worse scoring just 64 runs chasing target of 207 runs. Against Royal Challengers scored 201 runs and won the match. This time once again scoring just 105 runs isn't enough to win in a T20 match. Gujarat Giants have got good players, Dunkley, Deol, Meghana, Gardner but something lacks in the team and the same makes them loss matches.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Looking at the point table I feel there is zero competition against MI in this first season of WPL. RCB as usual is again at the bottom. The name itself is jinxed in my opinion as both men's & women's teams of RCB have never been on the top. DC looks good and they might be the only team to challenge MI. Only 18 more days left for this season to end and one thing is clear Harmanpreeth Singh has proven that she is one the best captain in women's cricket.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on March 13, 2023, 04:02:53 AMLooking at the point table I feel there is zero competition against MI in this first season of WPL. RCB as usual is again at the bottom. The name itself is jinxed in my opinion as both men's & women's teams of RCB have never been on the top. DC looks good and they might be the only team to challenge MI. Only 18 more days left for this season to end and one thing is clear Harmanpreeth Singh has proven that she is one the best captain in women's cricket.Mumbai Indians team is strong that if one player fails the other takes role and performs. This season of Premier League to be won by Mumbai Indians. Delhi Capitals expected to give good fight, but the team failed to perform scoring just 105 runs. More 4 matches remaining for every team makes the points table remain unchanged even if teams manage to make continuous wins.
